Name: Shadowbane
About the game: Shadowbane is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) with a fantasy background. The characteristic of shadowbane is unlimited free PVP.It has 12 races, 22 occupations, 48 affiliated occupations, more than 200 attribute points, and more than 500 skill points,all of which can be freely configured. The shadowbane is an open battlefield that can be arbitrarily harvested in the game. Its freedom and cruelty are its characteristics, and it is also a fair competition for power.
Developers: Beijing AmazGame Age Internet Technology Co., Ltd.
